original_text: There was a barrier before the side rooms, one cubit on either side. And the side rooms were six cubits on either side.
korean_text: 방 앞에 간막이 벽이 있는데 이쪽 간막이 벽도 한 척이요 저쪽 간막이 벽도 한 척이며 그 방은 이쪽도 여섯 척이요 저쪽도 여섯 척이며

sentences.original_text: There was a barrier before the side rooms
And the side rooms were six cubits on either side.
